title: Creating Tickets
description: Learn how to create and manage tickets
content:
# Creating Tickets

This guide explains how to create and manage tickets in nosDesk.

## Creating a New Ticket

1. Click on "New Ticket" in the top navigation
2. Fill in the required fields:
   - Title
   - Description
   - Priority
   - Category
3. Assign to a team member or leave unassigned
4. Save the ticket

## Managing Tickets

### Updating Status

You can update the status of a ticket by:
1. Opening the ticket
2. Selecting a new status from the dropdown
3. Saving the changes

### Adding Comments

To add a comment to a ticket:
1. Scroll to the comment section
2. Type your comment
3. Click "Add Comment"

### Assigning Tickets

To assign a ticket to a team member:
1. Open the ticket
2. Click on the "Assign" dropdown
3. Select a team member
4. Save the changes
